summary: Based on actual events, a Chinese university student responds violently when his chances for a Nobel Prize are dashed by school politics.
cast: Meryl Streep|Ye Liu|Peng Chi|Aidan Quinn|Blair Brown|Yonggui Wang|Lei Tsao|Jing Shan|He Yu|Bo Li|Boris McGiver|Bill Irwin|Hui Zhang|Taylor Schilling|Joe Grifasi|Rob Campbell|Jodi Russell|Erick Avari|Lloyd Suh|Qian Ye|John Rothman|Ying Hiong|Hui Zeng|Sina Amedson|Bill Gillane|Lei Tsao|Dan Christensen|Jeshua De Horta|Pam Eichner|Krystal King|Elizabeth Miklavcic|Dale Thomas|Tisha Vaculin|Kai Wong
title: Dark matter, un asunto muy oscuro
